name: Change Password
description: Users have the option to change their own password.

name: Create Project
description: Can have permission to create project

name: View All Users
description: Can view all users details

name: View Profile
description: Can view self profile details

name: Edit Profile
description: Can edit self profile details

name: Add User
description: Allow users to create new user account

name: Edit User
description: Allow users to edit other users profile

name: Delete User
description: Allow users to Delete other users profile

name: Create Group
description: Allow users to Create Permission Groups

name: View Permissions
description: Allow users to View all available Permissions

name: Edit Group
description: Allow users to Edit Permission Groups

name: View Group
description: Allow users to list All Available Permission Groups

name: View all Client Companies List
description: Allow users to list All Available Client Companies, Rememember User who create project need to select client company and will need this permission to create project

name: View all Customers List
description: Allow users to list All Customers

name: View specific customer
description: Allow users to view specific Customers, Users with edit customer permission should have this permission

name: Edit customer
description: Allow users to Edit Customers.

name: Add customer
description: Allow users to Add new Customers.

name: Delete customer
description: Allow users to Delete new Customers.

name: Get specific Client Company
description: Allow users to Get specific Client Company., User with edit client company permission should have this permission

name: Add Company
description: Allow users to Add new Company.

name: Edit Company
description: Allow users to Edit Company.

name: Delete Company
description: Allow users to Delete Company.

name: Upload Nessus CSV
description: Allow users to Upload the Nessus CSV file to parse the data and add vulnerabilities to project.

name: Delete Images
description: Allow users to Delete Upload Images, including Company Loogo, POC images etc.

name: Upload Images for Vulnerability
description: Allow users to Upload images while creating a vulnerability.

name: Add Scope to Projects
description: Allow users to add scope url/ip in a project.

name: Delete Scope from Projects
description: Allow users to delete scope url/ip in a project.

name: Edit Scope from Projects
description: Allow users to edit scope url/ip in a project.

name: View Scope from Projects
description: Allow users to view scope url/ip in a project.

name: Add Vulnerability in Projects
description: Allow users to add vulnerability in a project.

name: Create new Projects
description: Allow users to create a new project.

name: Edit Projects
description: Allow users to edit project.

name: View Specific Project
description: Allow users to view specific project details.

name: Change Project Status to Complete
description: Allow users to mark project as completed

name: View All Projects
description: Allow users to view all projects.

name: Delete Projects
description: Allow users to delete projects.

name: View Specific Vulnerability
description: Allow users to view specific vulnerability in a project.

name: Edit Vulnerability
description: Allow users to edit vulnerability in a project.

name: Delete Vulnerability
description: Allow users to delete vulnerability in a project.

name: View all Vulnerability for Project
description: Allow users to view all vulnerability in a project.

name: View All Instances For Vulnerability
description: Allow users to view instances in a vulnerability.

name: Add Instances
description: Allow users to add instances in a vulnerability.

name: Edit Instances
description: Allow users to edit instances in a vulnerability.

name: Delete Instances
description: Allow users to delete instances in a vulnerability.

name: Change Instances Status
description: Allow users to change instances status in a vulnerability.

name: Vulnerability Status
description: Allow users to change vulnerability status project.

name: Delete Retest Task
description: Allow users to delete retest task in a project.

name: View Retest for Projects
description: Allow users to view all retest in a project.

name: Add Retest for Projects
description: Allow users to add retest in a project..

name: Report Access
description: Allow users to View and Download Report.
